title: High-density polyethylene composites filled with micro- and nano-particles of nickel ferrite: magnetic, mechanical, and thermal properties
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18750-18763
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02643H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sarah Baayyad, Youssef Esshouba, Soufiane Barhoumi, El Kébir Hlil, Siham Ez-Zahraoui, Fatima-Zahra Semlali, Tarik Mahfoud, Hassan El Moussaoui, Mounir El Achaby
With the increasing demand of new magnetic materials for modern technological application alternatives to conventional magnetic materials, the development of lightweight polymer magnetic composites has become a prominent research area.
